channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Gallery Plugin for WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Gallery Plugin for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2024-3899|2024-09-11T15:14:47.101Z -- unknown -- gallery%20plugin%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The Gallery Plugin for WordPress WordPress plugin before 1.8.15 does not sanitise and escape some of its image settings, which could allow users with post-writing privilege such as Author to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks.

item.title: CVE-2024-3899|2024-09-11T06:00:01.796Z -- unknown -- gallery%20plugin%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The Gallery Plugin for WordPress WordPress plugin before 1.8.15 does not sanitise and escape some of its image settings, which could allow users with post-writing privilege such as Author to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
